import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faSort,faTrashAlt}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import"./Listing.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Listing=_ref=>{let{universities,searchTerm,onSearch,onSort,onDelete}=_ref;const[itemsToDelete,setItemsToDelete]=useState([]);const handleDelete=name=>{setItemsToDelete(prev=>[...prev,name]);setTimeout(()=>{onDelete(name);setItemsToDelete(prev=>prev.filter(item=>item!==name));},500);// Match with CSS animation duration
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"University Listing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-sort-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search...",value:searchTerm,onChange:onSearch,className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:onSort,className:"sort-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faSort,className:"icon"}),"Sort"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"university-list",children:universities.map(uni=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"university-item ".concat(itemsToDelete.includes(uni.name)?"fade-out":""),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/details",state:{university:uni},className:"university-link",children:uni.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(uni.name),className:"delete-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faTrashAlt,className:"icon"}),"Delete"]})]},uni.name))})]});};export default Listing;
